title: Make.com for Lead Generation in Law Firms
metaDescription: Automate lead generation for law firms with Make.com by orchestrating intake, qualification, and follow-up pipelines.
excerpt: Automating lead generation gives law firms a reliable way to nurture every inquiry without piling tasks on paralegals.

sections.intro:
Automating lead generation gives law firms a predictable way to move prospects from contact form to signed engagement. With Make.com, your intake staff can spend more time advising clients while workflows handle data entry and scheduling.

This playbook mirrors how we launch Make.com lead engines for boutique and midsize practices that need to improve response speed without adding headcount.
sections.benefits:
• Capture every intake request instantly across website, phone, and referral channels
  • Score matters by practice area and urgency so partners see the right cases first
  • Trigger templated follow-ups that keep prospects warm during conflicts checks
  • Push structured matter data into Clio, Filevine, or your preferred practice management system
sections.workflow: Connect contact touchpoints to Make.com, score each new matter with custom logic, and sync details to your CRM or practice platform while alerting the assigned attorney.
sections.steps:
1. Map every intake source (website, phone transcription, referral emails) and standardize required fields
  2. Build Make.com scenarios that parse submissions, enrich data, and flag conflicts automatically
  3. Send qualified leads to the right attorney inbox or Slack channel with structured briefs
  4. Create follow-up automations that deliver retainer packets and meeting links
  5. Report on funnel velocity with dashboards that surface conversion and lost-lead reasons
sections.results:
Firms typically reclaim 12+ hours a week of paralegal time while responding to prospects within minutes. Automated tracking improves visibility for partners and helps marketing teams identify high value referral sources.

After launch, most practices see a 15-25% lift in consultation bookings because every inquiry gets consistent, timely outreach.
